tweet: ICYMI – new provisions signed into law yesterday will make the Salton Sea eligible for millions of dollars in new funding! These federal funds will help us address the environmental and public health crisis at the Salton Sea. https://www.desertsun.com/story/news/2018/12/20/2018-farm-bill-makes-salton-sea-eligible-millions-federal-clean-up-funds/2380609002/?fbclid=IwAR27HEgSUAvw89IZOSUFl9aMpy1AqWNFAc490kUXppqET4KdD2x1KxPH8sA# …

I plan to introduce legislation on behalf of the @HispanicCaucus that will improve @CBP’s capacity to provide health care for asylum-seekers in DHS custody and border agents at the border, and help prevent future loss of life.
Being medically under-staffed, under-equipped, under-trained, and unprepared puts at risk the lives of children and possibly our border agents.

As an emergency physician and public health expert, I was dismayed at the lack of meaningful health screening and emergency response capacity for women and children seeking asylum at the @CBP Antelope Wells Port of Entry and Lordsburg Border Patrol Station.

The Farm Bill that passed this afternoon makes the Salton Sea eligible for millions of dollars in new federal funding! Proud to have fought for these funds, which double our resources to manage the decline of the Salton Sea. https://ruiz.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/ruiz-feinstein-secure-millions-potential-new-funding-salton-sea …

Excited to announce a new $200,000 grant awarded to the Mountain Communities Fire Safe Council! Proud to have supported their application for these funds, which will help MCFSC prevent wildfires from destroying private property. https://ruiz.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/dr-ruiz-mountain-communities-fire-safe-council-announce-200000-grant?fbclid=IwAR0Zm7Tft5GU0HWbx9G2YkFgeNM9cvtR-aJVBMBsK6Iu9RbGUDy-XXP3vB4 …

I am deeply saddened by the 7 year old’s tragic death. Why did it take a seizure to alert officials that this 105F febrile, dehydrated, sick child needed care? Community health centers play a major role in delivering affordable health care services to rural, underserved communities like ours. I am proud to support community health centers in our district and across the country! @NACHC @HCPSoCal @CPCA

Concerns like these are why I formed the bipartisan Burn Pits Caucus: to raise awareness about veterans like Jennifer Kepner, who passed away from pancreatic cancer after returning from Iraq. Our veterans deserve a government that takes these concerns seriously!
